text: @RandPaul This tweet devalue everyone’s Duke University School of Medicine degree. Also i understand that you “libertarian” philisophy doesn’t really go in sync with the whole “needs of the many, outweigh the needs of the few or one”, but maybe dial it back; you did test positive COVID-19
